DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study determine whether hepatitis C virus continue remain unable detected subject previously treat BMS-914143 achieve sustained virologic response
DOC.brief_title: Three-year Follow-up Study Subjects Who Participated Previous Lambda ( BMS-914143 ) Chronic Hepatitis C Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: Subjects must receive Lambda previous trial Hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) Ribonucleic acid ( RNA ) < LOQ completion require posttreatment followup ( must enter study within 6 month completion require posttreatment followup previous trial ) NOTE : For blind parent trial , subject HCV RNA < LOQ completion require posttreatment followup may enter study without knowledge treatment assignment parent study . Subjects receive control agent ( eg , pegylatedinterferon alfa ) previous protocol allow participate unblinded treatment information release ; time subject option continue study Subjects must treat antiviral immunomodulatory drug chronic hepatitis C completion previous study Lambda
